text: a taruvata a indriya binduvunu raktapu muddaga (jalagaga) marcamu. A paina a raktapu muddanu (jalaganu) mansapu muddaga (jivanuvula pindanga) marcamu, a jivanuvula pindanlo emukalanu erparaci, a emukalanu mansanto kappamu. A taruvata danini maroka (bhinna) srstiga cesamu. Kavuna subhakarudu (subhapradudu) ayina allah ye atyuttama srstikarta
